title: Dark Cinematic Impacts, Hits, Whooshes & Transitions
description: 200 Cutting Edge, Dark Cinematic Horror Impacts, Hits, Slams, Strikes, Whoosh & Transition Sound Effects!
longDescription:
Soundcloud demo: https://soundcloud.com/soundresponse/sinister-2-impacts-transitions-demo


With Sinister 2 sound library Sound Response brings you 200 professionally designed, dark cinematic horror impacts, hits, whoosh & transition sound effects collection perfect for thriller, action, or horror scenes in movies, games, teasers, trailers, videos, and more!


From massive disturbing hits, shattering horror impacts, strikes and slams, creepy stingers and shockers, to the eerie, unnerving, tension-building whooshes and transitions sound effects, Sinister 2 sound library will provide you with the right audio tool for eliciting and enhancing fear, anticipation and suspense. With this intense sound collection at your disposal youâ€™ll have a powerful audio arsenal for unleashing sonic hell that will keep your audience on the edge of their seats!


If you like the sound of Sinister 2 be sure to check out the first Sinister installment for even more dark cinematic hits, impacts, whooshes & transitions!


Sinister 2 Sound Effects List
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 200

Number of Audio Cues: 200

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX Loop: No

Minutes of Audio Provided: 12.03 min
